SEARCH
Package com.pds.curiousmind.model.library.implementation

Enum Class CourseLibrary

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<CourseLibrary>
com.pds.curiousmind.model.library.implementation.CourseLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
Library<Course>, Serializable, Comparable<CourseLibrary>, Constable
public enum CourseLibrary extends Enum<CourseLibrary> implements Library<Course>
Singleton library for managing Course objects in memory and synchronizing with persistent storage.

This class provides thread-safe operations for adding, updating, removing, and retrieving courses. It delegates persistence operations to an ICourseAdapter and maintains an in-memory list of courses for fast access.

Key Features:

  • Thread-safe in-memory storage using CopyOnWriteArrayList.
  • Delegates persistence to an adapter provided by AdapterProvider.
  • Supports reloading from persistent storage.
  • Provides methods to add, update, remove, and retrieve courses by ID or name.
  • Implements the Library interface.

Usage Example:

     CourseLibrary library = CourseLibrary.INSTANCE;
     Course course = new Course(...);
     library.add(course);
     List<Course> allCourses = library.getAll();
     Course found = library.getById(1L);
Since:
1.0

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Reloads the in-memory list of courses from persistent storage. This clears the current list and repopulates it with the latest data.
